channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
Any1 knows how 2 make this in your topscreen ? : Owner = Greenspirit ** Players online! :rolleyes:
i got a source (Total War Scape) that varrock is a save zone but i wana remove that some1 can help me and give me coords or somthing?
( Still cant find the coords )[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 01:45:01 PM[/size][hr]Little help plz :) :P :(

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Greenspirit Greenspirit
item.description:
@Greenspirit wrote:

Where i needed 2 add
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@bla@", 13589);//title
sendFrame126("@whi@the owner of this server is : greenspirit", 13593);
sendFrame126("@whi@Players Online : " +players, 13594);
setInterfaceWalkable(13588);
}

?

And that other things?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

for the playername and players add this

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@bla@", 13589);//title sendFrame126("@whi@the owner of this server is : greenspirit", 13593); sendFrame126("@whi@Players Online : " +players, 13594); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); }
and add this in public boolean process()

writePlayers();

Read full topic
